Location:
- Ceiling-mounted HVAC vent grille (white metal, horizontal blades).

Observations:
- Uniform louvered grille; flush with surrounding surface.
- Dust accumulation on blade tips; small red spot/color mark on right edge.

Potential Issues:
- No visible issues (no dents, cracks, gaps, rust, moisture stains, or loose components).

Recommendations:
- Routine cleaning to reduce dust buildup.
- Monitor for any airflow change or edge loosening; address sealant/mounting if signs appear.
